message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start to our negotiations!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm keeping most of the pie for myself. Let's see if you can do better!
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'll give you a tiny crumb, but I'm still holding most of the power. Don't expect much more from me!
I'll take a slightly larger share, but I'm still not satisfied with the split!
I'll give you a tiny, tiny piece of the pie, but I'm still the one calling the shots here. You should be grateful!
I'll take a smaller share, but I'm still not going to roll over!
